pr_title: Use Session.getDatasourceLogin() instead of Session.getLogin() in CDISEPlatform.java

timeline.message:
Use Session.getDatasourceLogin() instead of Session.getLogin() in CDISEPlatform.java

Signed-off-by: Laird Nelson <laird.nelson@oracle.com>

Fixing checkstyle errors

Signed-off-by: Laird Nelson <laird.nelson@oracle.com>

Fixing javadoc link errors

Signed-off-by: Laird Nelson <laird.nelson@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: Usual practice is to remove "All rights reserved." from updated copyright notices.
timeline.author: tjquinno
timeline.diffHunk:

- * Copyright (c) 2019 Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2019, 2020 Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.

Fixing copyright issue.
